name: Escape (VERY BROKEN)
description:
Line: Sneak your way out of work early without getting caught by your boss

It is a top down escape room where you have to dodge the co-workers before you the timer runs out. (Except it is very broken)

W/A/S/D to Move.

KNOWN BROKEN PARTS

Collisions with the walls were working when it broke for no reason, and the collision cones are all stacking in one spot rather than being on top of the enemies.
